trans-unit.source: Defines an area that receives and displays ink strokes.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个区域，它接收并显示墨迹笔画。

trans-unit.source: An InkCanvas is an element that can be used to receive and display ink input.
trans-unit.target: InkCanvas 是可以用于接收和显示墨迹输入元素。

trans-unit.source: This is commonly done through the use of a stylus, which interacts with a digitizer to produce ink strokes using a stylus or a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 这通常可以通过触笔与数字化仪产生墨迹笔画使用触笔或鼠标交互使用。

trans-unit.source: The created strokes are represented as <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> objects, and can be manipulated either programmatically or based on user input.
trans-unit.target: 创建的笔画表示为<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>对象，并可以以编程方式操作或根据用户输入。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The InkCanvas enables users to modify or delete an existing <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: InkCanvas 使用户能够修改或删除现有的<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The InkCanvas can be bound to a data source.
trans-unit.target: InkCanvas 可以绑定到数据源。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> property to: a base-64, encoded string that contains ink data in Ink Serialized format (ISF); or even to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> property of another InkCanvas.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以将绑定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>属性︰ base&64; 编码字符串，该字符串包含的墨迹中墨迹序列化的数据格式 (ISF); 或者甚至到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>属性的另一个 InkCanvas。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also bind properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>, to other data sources.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以绑定属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>，到其他数据源。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.target: 初始化 InkCanvas 类的新实例。

trans-unit.target: ActiveEditingMode 属性指示当前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>

trans-unit.target: 假设<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>并<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the tablet pen is used in an inverted position, ActiveEditingMode has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.
trans-unit.target: ActiveEditingMode 以反转使用触笔时，具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>值

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, its value is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.
trans-unit.target: 否则，其值为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the user can resize selected ink strokes and/or elements on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是否用户可以调整大小选定的墨迹笔画和/或元素上<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, an adorner border is drawn around ink strokes and/or elements when they are selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`true`，在选中时，墨迹笔画和/或元素周围绘制一个装饰器边框。

trans-unit.source: This border enables the user to resize the selected objects.
trans-unit.target: 此边框使用户能够调整所选的对象的大小。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.MoveEnabled%2A> is `true`, the adorner enables the user to move the strokes and/or elements as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.MoveEnabled%2A>是`true`，装饰器使用户能够移动笔画和/或元素也。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.MoveEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false` while one or more ink strokes and/or elements are selected, the adorner border is automatically removed from the selected objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`false`装饰器边框在选择了一个或多个墨迹笔画和/或元素时自动删除从所选对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a user can resize strokes and/or elements on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when a user completes a stroke using a pointing device.
trans-unit.target: 当用户完成笔画使用指针设备时，引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, a user might raise a stylus from a digitizer after making a motion, thereby completing a stroke.
trans-unit.target: 例如，用户可能来自数字化仪触笔之后抬起完成某移动动作，从而完成笔画。

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives an argument of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasStrokeCollectedEventArgs>, which references the completed stroke.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序接收类型的自变量<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasStrokeCollectedEventArgs>，它引用的已完成的笔划。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasStrokeCollectedEventArgs>
